wikipedia_page.main: Anne Hutchison McAllister   (29 November 1892 – 5 April 1983) was a leading Scottish speech therapist and teacher.

response: In the 1930s Matthew White started operating on children with cleft lip and cleft palate. He brought in Anne McAllister to administer speech therapy so that the children could make a full recovery.Renfrew, C. (2004-09-23). McAllister, Anne Hutchison (1892–1983), speech therapist and teacher. Oxford Dictionary of National Biography. Retrieved 17 Jan. 2018, see link
Barbara Schenck under the pseudonym Anne McAllister (b. California, United States) is a best-selling writer of over 55 romance novels since 1985.
* Anne McAllister's Webpage in Fantastic Fiction's Website
